BugInstance.message: Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.cdc.api.impl.CDCJobAPI.initIncrementalPosition(CDCJobConfiguration) converts checked exception to unchecked
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.cdc.api.impl.CDCJobAPI.getDataSourceConfiguration(ShardingSphereDatabase) does not presize the allocation of a collection

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.cdc.api.impl.CDCJobAPI.buildDumperConfiguration(CDCJobConfiguration, int, TableNameSchemaNameMapping) uses iterator().next() on a List to get the first item
This API MD5 (MDX) is not a recommended cryptographic hash function
Enum class org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.cdc.constant.CDCSinkType only declares one enum value
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.cdc.core.connector.SocketSinkImporterConnector has a circular dependency with other classes
Non derivable method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.cdc.core.importer.SocketSinkImporter.processDataRecords(List) declares throwing an exception that isn't thrown
Constrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.cdc.core.importer.SocketSinkImporter.runBlocking() converts checked exception to unchecked

Method new org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.cdc.core.importer.SocketSinkImporter(ImporterConfiguration, ImporterConnector, PipelineChannel, PipelineJobProgressListener, ImporterType) defines parameters more abstractly than needed to function properly
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.cdc.core.job.CDCJob has a circular dependency with other classes
Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.cdc.core.prepare.CDCJobPreparer.initIncrementalTasks(CDCJobItemContext) converts checked exception to unchecked
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.cdc.exception.NotFindStreamDataSourceTableException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value

org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.cdc.util.CDCSchemaTableUtils.parseTableExpressionWithoutSchema(ShardingSphereDatabase, List): 2nd parameter 'tableNames' could be declared as java.util.Collection instead
Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.cdc.util.ColumnValueConvertUtils.convertToProtobufMessage(Object) converts checked exception to unchecked
Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.cdc.util.ColumnValueConvertUtils.convertToProtobufMessage(Object) converts checked exception to unchecked
